```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
```

```{r plotting visitor to Channel Islands NP}
ca_np <- read_csv("data/ca_np.csv")

ci_np <- read_excel("data/ci_np.xlsx")

ggplot(data = ci_np, aes(x = year, y = visitors)) +
  geom_line()

gg_base <- ggplot(data = ci_np,
                  aes(x = year,
                      y = visitors))

gg_base +
  geom_point()

gg_base +
  geom_col()

gg_base + 
  geom_area()

gg_base +
  geom_line(
    colour = "darkseagreen",
    linetype = "dashed"
  )

gg_base +
  geom_point(
    colour = "darkseagreen",
    pch = 16,
    size = 3,
    alpha = 0.5
  )

gg_base +
  geom_point(
    aes(size = visitors,
        color = visitors),
    alpha = 0.5
  )

gg_base +
  geom_col(
    aes(fill = visitors)
  )
```
